ZenMode.PluginDescription: Stay Zen with Piwik. Zen mode keeps things simple. It is available via the icon in the top right of the screen.
ZenMode.QuickAccessTitle: Search for menu entries, reports and websites
ZenMode.HowToSearch: To search for menu items, reports or websites use the search box on the top right or press 'alt+f'.
ZenMode.HowToToggleZenMode: To leave or enter the zen mode click the arrow on the top right or press 'alt+z'.
